headline: FlexTrade Integrates CME Group’s FX Spot+ and EBS Market Offerings for Enhanced FX Trading
summary: NEW YORK, February 09, 2026--FlexTrade Systems (@FlexTrade), a global leader in multi-asset execution and order management systems, today announced an integration with CME Group’s EBS Market central limit order book (CLOB) and its FX Spot+ platform. The move is designed to diversify and deepen the sources of actionable liquidity available to FlexTrade’s FlexFX users through an integration into CME Group's substantial liquidity pools for spots via FX Spot+.
